effects.name: Illusory Wolf
effects.description: The caster weaves an illusory wolf for <dur> seconds which draws attention from nearby enemies while fleeing from combat. The image dissolves after it takes enough attacks for enemies to realize it's deception.

effects.name: Illusory Wolf (Improved)
effects.description: If improved, it can take more attacks before it dissolves.

effects.name: Sound
effects.description: The caster creates a thundering noise at the target location, staggering nearby enemies.

effects.name: Sound (Improved)
effects.description: If improved, the noise disrupts the targets' perception, decreasing their ability to detect distant targets by <mag>% for <dur> seconds.

effects.name: Pain (Single)
effects.description: The touched target that fail to resist believe to have suffered a grievous wound, reducing their health by <mag> for <dur> seconds and staggers.

effects.name: Pain (Dual)
effects.description: The touched target that fail to resist believe to have suffered a grievous wound, reducing their health by <mag> for <dur> seconds and staggers.

effects.name: Pain (Improved)
effects.description: If improved, the spell causes additional unrecoverable pain, directly damaging their health by <mag>.
